content: add a navbar with navlinks home, about, integrations and contact us page

add a button that says hey there

The conversation involved a user discussing enhancements for their blockchain application with an AI assistant. The user requested an addition of a sidebar featuring navlinks for home, about, and contact, to which the AI confirmed it would implement this feature. Additionally, the user was presented with a list of optional features, including an interactive dashboard, dynamic search functionality, and user authentication, with some items marked as checked, such as night mode and real-time updates. The AI further asked two questions regarding the placement and function of a "Hello World" button, offering options for both positioning and the action on press. The user confirmed they wanted the button added. The AI expressed appreciation for the idea and requested more details about the project.
